demo-mcp-obs-stdio.description: Demo MCP server (stdio) with echo tool that responds 'hello from mcp-obs (stdio): {message}'

demo-mcp-obs-sse.description: Demo MCP server (SSE) with echo tool that responds 'hello from mcp-obs (SSE): {message}' - requires server running

demo-mcp-obs-streamable.description: Demo MCP server (Streamable HTTP) with echo tool that responds 'hello from mcp-obs (Streamable HTTP): {message}' - requires server running

demo-mcp-obs-oauth15.description: Demo MCP server (OAuth Streamable HTTP) with echo tool that responds 'hello from mcp-obs (OAuth Streamable HTTP): {message} (authenticated as: user@example.com)' - requires OAuth server running and valid Bearer tokens
